alternateName: A Traffic Dataset includes Traffic Time Series, Incidents and Meta of Roads.

distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the XTraffic dataset

distribution.name: incidents.csv
distribution.description: The incident data includes records of traffic accidents that occurred throughout 2023 in the areas covered by all sensors in the XTraffic dataset.

distribution.name: sensor_meta_feature.csv
distribution.description: The sensor meta data consists of meta attributes for the lane where each sensor deployed on the road is located, including policy-related attributes (such as designated speed limits and road usage) and physical attributes (such as road material and road width).

field.name: Incident Id
field.description: Unique identifier for each recorded traffic incident.

field.name: Duration (mins)
field.description: Length of the incident measured in minutes from start to resolution.

field.name: Fwy
field.description: The freeway name where the incident occurred.

field.name: Abs PM
field.description: Point of the incident in absolute postmile notation along the road.

field.name: AREA
field.description: The city or town where the incident took place.

field.name: LOCATION
field.description: The exact address on the freeway where the incident happened.

field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.description: A brief narrative describing the specifics of the incident.

field.name: type
field.description: Category of the incident, such as accident, hazard, or road closure.

field.name: dt
field.description: Timestamp indicating when the incident was first reported.

recordSet.name: incidents.csv
recordSet.description: The incident data includes records of traffic accidents that occurred throughout 2023 in the areas covered by all sensors in the XTraffic dataset.

field.name: Fwy
field.description: The name of the freeway where the sensor is located in.

field.name: District
field.description: The district ID.

field.name: County
field.description: The county where the sensor is located in, e.g., Orange, Los Angeles.

field.name: City
field.description: The city where the sensor is located in, e.g., Marina, Oakland.

field.name: Abs PM
field.description: Point of measurement in absolute postmile notation along the road.

field.name: Length
field.description: The total length of the lane on the road.

field.name: station_id
field.description: Unique identifier for each traffic sensor.

field.name: Name
field.description: Name of the sensor location.

field.name: Type
field.description: The level of the road, e.g., mainline, On-Ramp.

field.name: Sensor Type
field.description: The sensor cateogry, e.g., radars, magnetometers.

field.name: HOV
field.description: Whether it is HOV lane or not

field.name: Road Width
field.description: Total width in meters from one side to the other.

field.name: Lane Width
field.description: Width in meters of each traffic lane on the road.

field.name: Inner Shoulder Width
field.description: Width in meters of the inner shoulder on the lane.

field.name: Outer Shoulder Width
field.description: Width in meters of the outer shoulder on the lane.

field.name: Design Speed Limit
field.description: Maximum speed limit designed for the road in kilometers per hour.

field.name: Inner Median Type
field.description: Type of median on the inner side of the road.

field.name: Inner Median Width
field.description: Width in meters of the median on the inner side of the road.

field.name: Terrain
field.description: Physical features and shape of a landscape, e.g., flat, mountainous.

field.name: Population
field.description: Type of terrain surrounding the road, e.g., urban, rural.

field.name: Barrier
field.description: Description of any barriers along the road, e.g., guardrail, none.

field.name: Surface
field.description: Road surface type, e.g., asphalt, concrete.

field.name: Roadway Use
field.description: Primary use of the road, e.g., auxiliary lane, bus lane.

field.name: Lat
field.description: Geographical latitude of the road's location.

field.name: Lng
field.description: Geographical longitude of the road's location.

field.name: Direction
field.description: The direction of the lane, e.g., E,N

recordSet.name: sensor_meta_feature.csv
recordSet.description: The sensor meta data consists of meta attributes for the lane where each sensor deployed on the road is located, including policy-related attributes (such as designated speed limits and road usage) and physical attributes (such as road material and road width).

name: XTraffic
description: Historically, research in traffic and incidents has proceeded along two distinct but intrinsically linked tracks. The traffic domain has focused on enhancing deep learning models to incrementally improve prediction accuracy, while the incident track has predominantly concentrated on isolated studies of incident risks and patterns. For the first time, our XTraffic dataset integrates these two tracks both spatially and temporally across a comprehensive regional scale, encompassing 16,972 traffic nodes for the entire year of 2023. The dataset includes detailed time-series data on traffic flow, lane occupancy, and average vehicle speed, as well as meticulously aligned records of incidents across seven different classes, synchronized with the traffic data. Each node also features extensive physical and policy-level meta-attributes of lanes.
